areYouSureToExit: Are you sure you want to exit?
exitWarning: Press ESC key or click Go Back to close
youCanSeeItInHomePage: You can see it in home page
infoInstruction: Enter information of the old passport as following format:
namesAsInPassport: Names must be as same as written in passport.
passportNoFormat: Passport No. must be formatted as 'AA000000'
nationalNoFormat: National No. must be formatted as '000-0000-0000'
noNumbersInNames: You cannot use numbers in names
noSymbolsInNames: You cannot use symbols in names
noArabicInEnglish: You cannot use Arabic letters in English names
noEnglishInArabic: You cannot use English letters in Arabic names
noLettersAfter2Digits: The passport number cannot contain letters after 2 digits
whereToReceive: Where do you want to recieve the passport?
locationInstruction: Please choose the location where you want to recieve your new passport.
passportPhotoInstruction: Please take a photo of your Sudanese passport, make sure it is clear and readable.
sdnNotDetected: SDN not found in the document. Please retake with a clear view of a Sudanese passport.
failedToExtractText: Failed to extract text from image. Please try again.
sdnDetected: Sudanese passport detected! You can continue.
processingAndChecking: Processing image and checking for SDN...
personalPhotoInstruction: Please provide a clear photo of your face with a white background.
signatureInstruction: Please sign in the box below. You have {maxStrokes} strokes.
noApplications: You don't have any applications to see
pressButtonToStart: Press the button to start a new application
heroSubtitle: Skip the long lines and endless waiting. Tajdeed makes passport renewal simple, fast, and secure with advanced AI validation and an intuitive online process.
whyBroken: Why Traditional Passport Renewal is Broken
whyBrokenSubtitle: We understand the frustration of outdated government processes. Here's how Tajdeed solves these problems.
waitingInLinesDesc: Stand in long queues for hours, disrupting your entire day and work schedule.
limitedHoursDesc: Restricted to specific times and places, making it difficult to fit into your schedule.
weeksOfProcessingDesc: Extended waiting periods with uncertain timelines and limited tracking.
applyInMinutesDesc: Complete your entire application online in under 10 minutes from the comfort of your home.
availability247Desc: Apply anytime, anywhere. No more taking time off work or rushing to beat closing hours.
aiValidationDesc: Advanced technology ensures your documents are perfect before submission, reducing delays.
poweredByTechSubtitle: Our cutting-edge features ensure the highest security and easiest experience for your passport renewal.
aiPhotoValidationDesc: Using FaceJS technology, we automatically validate that your passport photo meets all official requirements. Our AI checks for proper lighting, background, face positioning, and official standards compliance.
smartDocProcessingDesc: TesseractJS OCR technology automatically extracts and validates information from your existing passport and ID documents, ensuring 100% accuracy and preventing human error.
simple3StepSubtitle: Get your passport renewed in just a few minutes with our guided process
step1Desc: Complete the simple form with guided assistance. Our smart validation helps you avoid common mistakes.
step2Desc: Take photos of your documents and passport photo. Our AI validates everything automatically in real-time.
step3Desc: Submit your application and track its progress in real-time through your personal dashboard.
readyToRenewSubtitle: Join thousands of Sudanese citizens who have already experienced the easiest passport renewal process ever.
footerDesc: Making passport renewal simple, fast, and secure for all Sudanese citizens.
footerRights: © 2025 Tajdeed. All rights reserved. Made with ❤️ for Sudan.
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again
